mva2.adapter

Class TreeSection<M>

  • java.lang.Object
    • mva2.adapter.Section
      • mva2.adapter.NestedSection
        • mva2.adapter.TreeSection<M>
  • Type Parameters:
    M - Model class for section
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Notifier

    public class TreeSection<M>
extends NestedSection
implements Notifier
    TreeSection class is still in alpha stage. If you use this class be aware that its public api's are subject to change without backward compatibility. TreeSection, as the name suggests, can be used to display a list of nested items. Ex : To display a list of nested comments. The main difference between NestedSection and TreeSection is while NestedSection can display nested elements, TreeSection can display a parent item and list of its child elements.

    • Method Detail

      • getChild

        public TreeSection getChild(int index)
        Returns the child section at the specified position in this list.
        Parameters:
        index - index of the child section to return
        Returns:
        the child section at the specified position in this list
        Throws:
        java.lang.IndexOutOfBoundsException - if the index is out of range (index < 0 || index >= size())

      • getParent

        public M getParent()
        Returns the current item. If the section, for example, displays a tree of comments then this method will return the current comment item for this section.
        Returns:
        Current item object

      • setTreeDecorator

        public void setTreeDecorator(Decorator treeDecorator)
        Sets a decorator for TreeSection and its child items.
        Parameters:
        treeDecorator - Decorator that needs to be set for current TreeSection and its child sections

      • addSection

        public void addSection(Section section)
        Adds a TreeSection to the current TreeSection. If the section being added is not an instance of TreeSection, IllegalArgumentException will be thrown.
        Overrides:
        addSection in class NestedSection
        Parameters:
        section - TreeSection to be added
